description:
In this Basics series episode I show you what to buy for your first set of terrain building paint brushes. You don't need to break the bank, this simple set of brushes will get you started.

Mothership: http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

Buy your first brush set: http://amzn.to/2nfWfXa
Buy an affordable detail brush set: http://amzn.to/2n08NWD
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)


For a list of all the tools & supplies I use most: https://blackmagiccraft.wordpress.com/shop/

Join "The Fellowship" & Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Join Black Magic Craft on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft
tags: Basics: What Paint Brushes Should You Buy For Building Terrain
title: Basics: What Paint Brushes Should You Buy For Building Terrain? (Black Magic CraftEpisode 025)
